summary: This is a brief email correspondence from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a grand jury subpoena to USAA (likely a financial institution) for service of legal process. It indicates ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case in mid-2020.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email who is transmitting a grand jury subpoena for service of legal process to USAA.

events.title: Service of Grand Jury Subpoena to USAA
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney transmits a grand jury subpoena to USAA for service of legal process.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to USAA (likely a financial institution) on June 29, 2020.
The subpoena was transmitted by an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
This indicates continued investigative activity related to the Epstein case in mid-2020, over a year after Epstein's death.
